name: cookiejs
description: Change the cookie library a simple API provides
author: kenny wang

scripts.build:min: umd cookie src/cookie.js | uglifyjs -mc | bannerjs -o > dist/cookie.min.js
scripts.build:dist: umd cookie src/cookie.js | bannerjs -m | uglifyjs -b beautify=true --comments 'all' > dist/cookie.js
scripts.build: npm run build:min && npm run build:dist && npm run build:test
